titles.title: A bill to provide that a justice or judge convicted of a felony shall be suspended from office without pay.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S456)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal judicial code to provide that any justice of the Supreme Court, circuit judge, or district judge convicted of a felony shall be suspended from office without pay pending the disposition of impeachment proceedings.
